full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GRUB CHEN THANG STONG RGYAL PO'I RDO RJE'I GSUNGS SKYA NANG GROL MAR GRAGS PA'I SMON LAM BYIN RLABS CAN BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002B (CES PA 'DI NI GDAN SA CHEN PO DPAL LDAN SA SKYAR NAD RIMS MI GCIG PA SNA TSOGS BYUNG BAR, SNGAGS BON RNAMS @003A *, ,KYIS MDOS GTOR SMAN SNGAGS SRUNG BA SOGS GANG BSGRUBS KYANG MA PHAN PAR GDAN SA STONGS LA THUG PA'I SKABS, RJE GRUB THOB CHEN POS NAM MKHA' MA'I SKYABS 'GRO GYIS, MA nI BGRANGS, ,SMON LAM 'DI THOB CES BKA' STZAL BA BZHIN BGYIS PA LA BRTEN NAD YAMS THAMS CAD 'PHRAL DU CHAD PAS, SA SKYA'I NAD GROL MA'I SMON LAM ZHES RDO RJE'I GSUNG BYIN RLABS KYI SPRIN PHUNG 'PHRO BAR GRAGS SO, ,MANGGA LAm,)
